languages.text: {n}Эмелина поднимает взор вверх.{/n} "Избавить этот мир от полугодовой ночи, а мандрагор — от глобального преимущества. Заставить еще одно светило — рукотворное на сей раз — взойти над горизонтом и осветить темную сторону мира. Если бы ритуал завершился успешно... я бы овладела тайной сотворять солнца".

{n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина поднимает взор вверх.{/n} "Избавить этот мир от полугодовой ночи, а мандрагор — от глобального преимущества. Заставить еще одно светило — рукотворное на сей раз — взойти над горизонтом и осветить темную сторону мира. Если бы ритуал завершился успешно... я бы овладела тайной сотворять солнца".

I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜抬起了头。{/n}“那个仪式可以让这个世界长达半年的黑夜彻底结束，让那些曼德拉无所遁形。这个仪式可以让人造的新天体升到地平线之上，彻底照亮这颗行星的黑暗面。一旦仪式成功……我便会掌握铸造新恒星的秘密。”
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜抬起了头。{/n}“那个仪式可以让这个世界长达半年的黑夜彻底结束，让那些曼德拉无所遁形。这个仪式可以让人造的新天体升到地平线之上，彻底照亮这颗行星的黑暗面。一旦仪式成功……我便会掌握铸造新恒星的秘密。”

languages.text: {n}Emelina alza la mirada.{/n} «Librará a este mundo de su noche de medio año y a las Mandrágoras de su ventaja insuperable ante nosotros. Hará que un nuevo cuerpo celeste, obra de manos humanas, se eleve sobre el horizonte e ilumine el lado oscuro del planeta. Si el ritual funciona... habré dominado el secreto de forjar un nuevo sol».
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina alza la mirada.{/n} «Librará a este mundo de su noche de medio año y a las Mandrágoras de su ventaja insuperable ante nosotros. Hará que un nuevo cuerpo celeste, obra de manos humanas, se eleve sobre el horizonte e ilumine el lado oscuro del planeta. Si el ritual funciona... habré dominado el secreto de forjar un nuevo sol».

languages.text: {n}エメリナは上の方を見る。{/n}「それはこの世界から半年の長きに渡る夜を取り除き、マンドレイクが私たちに対して完全に有利な状況を取り除くでしょう。それは新しい天体、これは人間が作った天体を地平線の上に浮かび上がらせ、地球の暗黒面を照らすでしょう。儀式がうまくいけば…私は新しい太陽を作る秘密をマスターしたことになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナは上の方を見る。{/n}「それはこの世界から半年の長きに渡る夜を取り除き、マンドレイクが私たちに対して完全に有利な状況を取り除くでしょう。それは新しい天体、これは人間が作った天体を地平線の上に浮かび上がらせ、地球の暗黒面を照らすでしょう。儀式がうまくいけば…私は新しい太陽を作る秘密をマスターしたことになるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Emelina lève les yeux.{/n} « Ce rituel mettra fin à la nuit dans laquelle ce monde est plongé la moitié de l'année et privera ainsi les Mandragores de leur avantage sur nous. Un nouveau corps céleste – d'origine humaine, cette fois – se lèvera à l'horizon afin d'illuminer le côté sombre de la planète. Si le rituel fonctionne... j'aurai appris à créer un nouveau soleil. »
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina lève les yeux.{/n} « Ce rituel mettra fin à la nuit dans laquelle ce monde est plongé la moitié de l'année et privera ainsi les mandragores de leur avantage sur nous. Un nouveau corps céleste – d'origine humaine, cette fois – se lèvera à l'horizon afin d'illuminer le côté sombre de la planète. Si le rituel fonctionne... j'aurai appris à créer un nouveau soleil. »

languages.text: {n}Emelina richtet ihren Blick nach oben.{/n} "Es befreit diese Welt von der Nacht, die ein halbes Jahr währt, von den Mandraks und ihrer kompletten Überlegenheit uns gegenüber. Es erzwingt einen neuen Himmelskörper – von Menschen geschaffen –, der am Horizont aufgeht und die dunkle Seite des Planeten erhellt. Falls das Ritual funktioniert ... habe ich das Geheimnis gemeistert, wie man eine neue Sonne erschafft."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina richtet ihren Blick nach oben.{/n} "Es befreit diese Welt von der Nacht, die ein halbes Jahr währt, von den Mandraks und ihrer kompletten Überlegenheit uns gegenüber. Es erzwingt einen neuen Himmelskörper – von Menschen geschaffen –, der am Horizont aufgeht und die dunkle Seite des Planeten erhellt. Falls das Ritual funktioniert ... habe ich das Geheimnis gemeistert, wie man eine neue Sonne erschafft."

languages.text: {n}Emelina bakışlarını yukarı doğru kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu dünyayı yarım yıl süren geceden, bizi de Kankurutanların üzerimizde sahip olduğu büyük avantajdan kurtaracağım. Yeni, insan yapımı, semavi bir kütlenin ufuktan yükselmesine ve gezegenin karanlık tarafını aydınlatmasını sağlayacak. Ayin işe yararsa... Yeni bir güneş yaratmanın sırrına nail olmuş olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina lifts her gaze upward.{/n} "It will rid this world of its half-year-long night and the Mandrakes of their total advantage over us. It will force a new heavenly body — this one of human making — to rise above the horizon and illuminate the dark side of the planet. If the ritual works... I will have mastered the secret of forging a new sun."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina bakışlarını yukarı doğru kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu dünyayı yarım yıl süren geceden, bizi de Kankurutanların üzerimizde sahip olduğu büyük avantajdan kurtaracağım. Yeni, insan yapımı, semavi bir kütlenin ufuktan yükselmesine ve gezegenin karanlık tarafını aydınlatmasını sağlayacak. Ayin işe yararsa... Yeni bir güneş yaratmanın sırrına nail olmuş olacağım."
